com.amazonaws.mobile.config

Class AWSConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobile.config.AWSConfiguration

  • public class AWSConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    A container for the JSONObject representation of SDK configuration. Reads the res/raw/awsconfiguration.json file in your project by default. This can be specified in the constructor through the resource id, if you wish to read a different resource as your configuration source.

    • Method Detail

      • optJsonObject

        public org.json.JSONObject optJsonObject(java.lang.String key)
        This method will search for the name provided in the json and unwrap the configuration specified by setConfiguration(String). Example: { "S3TransferUtility": { "Default": { "Bucket": "waterBucket", "Region": "us-west-2" } } } When name is "S3TransferUtility" and setConfiguration is "Default", The value return is: { "Bucket": "waterBucket", "Region": "us-west-2" } Certain keys do not have a configuration (i.e. "Default") and when this happens the value for the key is directly returned.
        Parameters:
        key - used to search for in JSON map
        Returns:
        an immutable copy of the value mapped by name if it exists and is a JSONObject, or null otherwise.

      • getUserAgent

        public java.lang.String getUserAgent()
        Returns:
        The user agent specified in the configuration file.

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration(java.lang.String configurationName)
        Change the settings that are being read in. This is "Default" by default.
        Parameters:
        configurationName - the key used to differentiate between configuration settings

      • getConfiguration

        public java.lang.String getConfiguration()
        Returns:
        the configuration This is "Default" by default.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
